creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: horizontally oriented painting of two blossoming pink roses; foliage begins LLC, extends upward with a bud near top center, and horizontally towards LR with the two blossoming roses; black and blue butterfly at top rose; three lines of calligraphy at ULC with two part rectangular seal with rounded edges
markings: ULC, two-part intaglio stamp; on back, top edge near ULC, in pencil: [Baitoku/ (Baiitsu pupil)]
title: Flowers and Butterfly
